full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal: Service Truck Cap and Other Equipment

### Issued by: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC)

**Reference Number:** WS3684748571

**Solicitation Number:** WS3684748571

**Publication Date:** September 28, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** October 27, 2022, 2:00 p.m. EDT (1440 UTC)

### Overview

Request for Proposal (RFP) No. WS3684748571, issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), seeks to acquire a service truck cap and other equipment, including installation, located in Valcartier, Québec, Canada.

### Procurement Details

- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Delivery:** Québec, Canada
- **Expected Contract Duration:** October 2022 to March 31, 2023

### Tender Requirements

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on or before the tender closing date. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

For more information and to access the RFP package, please visit the official notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14231845?extsite=MTQyMzE4NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14231845?extsite=MTQyMzE4NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information:**

Rafael Uribe (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [rafael.uribe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rafael.uribe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
